name: Space Switch (Robert)
description:
Space Switch

You are an astronaut that got in the middle of nowhere in space and you have to get out of there! In this world, you will be able to switch dimensions and non-real stuff will become real, but only for 5 seconds!

Good luck completing the levels of the puzzle (there are 8) and have fun!

Music done by AdhesiveWombat: https://soundcloud.com/adhesivewombat

Controls:

A / D - Left / Right Movement

Space - Jump

J - Switch on/off jump boost

K - Switch Dimension

L - Grab/Drop Box
